overview:
Vincent Hunt is a Co-founder of Kind Intelligence, Inc., The Hospitality Intelligence Company; and serves as the organizations Chairman and CEO. With over 17 years of design and innovation experience, he delivers an intuitive ability to rethink, redefine and reinvent traditional business paradigms. A post-industrial entrepreneur, groundbreaking thinker and innovator, Hunt has made his imprint as an evangelist of possibility thinking vs competition thinking. He evokes disruptive innovation through the creation of new business models that ultimately lend to progressive paths of opportunity.

At Kind, Vincent brings vision to leadership by inspiring, cultivating and championing the companyâ€™s innovation initiatives. Vincent ensures that Kind not only views innovation as a means for creating new products, services, brands and communication, but fundamentally a way to transform an organizations perception of the hospitality industry.

Preceding the creation of Kind Intelligence, Vincent worked as a Consultant to companies looking to emerge in the post-industrial economy through the conceptualization and development of new products, services and brands. He enjoys family, scuba diving, cycling and the occasional debate on the responsibility of the modern education system to the post-industrial generation of innovators and creators.

relationships.title: Founder, CEO, Director of Creative Excellence
